languages.text: "Слова твои — ложь и навет. Не оскорбляй имя Его, произнося его!"
"Your words are blasphemous lies. Do not sully His name with your tongue!"
languages.original_text: "Слова твои — ложь и навет. Не оскорбляй имя Его, произнося его!"

traits.locale_text: "Your words are blasphemous lies. Do not sully His name with your tongue!"
"Your words are blasphemous lies. Do not sully His name with your tongue!"
"Your words are blasphemous lies. Do not sully His name with your tongue!"
"Your words are blasphemous lies. Do not sully His name with your tongue!"

languages.text: 「お前の言葉は冒涜的な嘘だ。神聖な御名をお前の舌で汚すな！」
languages.original_text: "Your words are blasphemous lies. Do not sully His name with your tongue!"

traits.locale_text: 「お前の言葉は冒涜的な嘘だ。神聖な御名をお前の舌で汚すな！」

languages.text: « Vos mots ne sont que des blasphèmes mensongers. Ne souillez pas Son nom avec vos paroles ! »
languages.original_text: "Your words are blasphemous lies. Do not sully His name with your tongue!"

traits.locale_text: « Vos mots ne sont que des blasphèmes mensongers. Ne souillez pas Son nom avec vos paroles ! »

languages.text: “全都是亵渎神明的谎言！我不允许你用你的舌头耽误祂的圣名！”
languages.original_text: "Your words are blasphemous lies. Do not sully His name with your tongue!"

traits.locale_text: “全都是亵渎神明的谎言！我不允许你用你的舌头耽误祂的圣名！”

languages.text: «Tus palabras no son más que mentiras blasfemas. ¡No mancilles Su nombre con ellas!».
languages.original_text: "Your words are blasphemous lies. Do not sully His name with your tongue!"

traits.locale_text: «Tus palabras no son más que mentiras blasfemas. ¡No mancilles Su nombre con ellas!».

languages.text: "Eure Worte sind blasphemische Lügen. Besudelt seinen Namen nicht mit Eurer Zunge!"
languages.original_text: "Your words are blasphemous lies. Do not sully His name with your tongue!"

traits.locale_text: "Eure Worte sind blasphemische Lügen. Besudelt seinen Namen nicht mit Eurer Zunge!"

languages.text: "Sözlerin kâfirliğin, zehirli yalanlarından ibaret. O'nun adını ağzına alıp leke sürmeyeceksin!"
languages.original_text: "Your words are blasphemous lies. Do not sully His name with your tongue!"

traits.locale_text: "Sözlerin kâfirliğin, zehirli yalanlarından ibaret. O'nun adını ağzına alıp leke sürmeyeceksin!"
